title: Iran, USMCA & Immigration
itunes:title: Iran, USMCA & Immigration
description:
Kevin spoke with Luis Miranda, Former DNC Communications Director, and Louise Schiavone, Journalist and Senior Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University CAREY Business School. They discussed Iran's shooting-down of a U-S drone, USMCA, and comments made by Democratic Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
